transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Namaste.
Executive: Haan sir very good afternoon sir, main Gopal Krishna bol raha hun IndiaMART head office se branch.
Customer: Actually I tried connecting with you but
Executive: Sir can I ask something? Aapko sharam nahi hai sir?
Customer: Sir aapko do baar bola hai subah 10 baje phone karne ke liye.
Customer: Ye bhi aap free ho gaye to mujhe phone karne ke liye aaye hai kya? Achcha nahi hai.
Executive: Sir ye batao maine aapko call maine aapko call kiya sir aapko problem kya hai sir aap bataiye kis time baat karni hai aapki services ke liye main call kar raha hun isme kya hai sharam wali baat hai.
Customer: Sir main kya sir 10 baje phone karega to main jo jo morning time me phone karega to mere ko koi kaam nahi aayega.
Executive: Sir dekha na aap dusre call pe vyast the sir maine aapko call nahi kiya aap bol rahe hai aap pehle check to kariye sir maine aapko call kiya hai ki nahi.
Customer: Sir aapne jab mujhe phone kiya isi number pe jo phone kiya tha kitne baje 11 baje.
Executive: Ji sir maine aapko 11 baje call kiya hai sir.
Customer: Hmm 11 baje phone kiya tha.
Executive: Sir koi bhi call main aapko 11 baje se pehle nahi kar paunga sir kyunki mera office ki jo timing hai wo usi time se main aapko call connect kar paunga because every morning meri
Customer: Sir sun sun sun sun nahi to aap mujhe kal batana chahiye tha ise main 11 baje phone karega sir.
Customer: Abhi main ek to sir abhi aap aap itne discussion kar rahe hai to aap hum kaam ki cheez ko discuss kar lete sir aapko bhi matlab jo requirement hai wo fulfill kar sakta hun jo kaam ki cheez hai baat kar lete na sir.
Executive: Sir main aapko ye to nahi keh raha hun na koi aap dekho aapke business ke lekar main baat karne wala hun main aapko koi alag cheez nahi aaya hun ki sir ye kar lijiyega main koi aapko insurance ki baat nahi kar raha hun koi health insurance ki baat nahi kar raha hun koi other policies ki baat nahi kar raha hun sir main aapke business ki baat karne ke liye call kar raha hun.
Customer: Hmm theek hai batao isme kya nahi main thoda sa isme bas itna hi aap logo ka jo tarika hai normally jo hai na jo south indian ka jo bhi hai wo logo ka jo tarika hai wo alag hai iske liye uske liye guzaar raha hai.
Customer: Ya har ek time jo har ek time bolna padta hai isi time phone kar lo wo time phone kar lo.
Executive: Haan to sir main humne ye bhi aapko bol rakha hai dekho sir ye ek platform hai dekho yahan everything is on tele browsing if aapke time pe aapke paas call nahi aaya aapki demand time because dekho aap iklota customer nahi hai meri team ke paas sir aur bhi customer hote hai to schedule alag alag appointments hoti hai if aap comfortable time aapko jab bhi lagta hai aap bhi incoming call kar sakte hai aisa nahi ki aapko usi time pe baat karna ho jab bhi aap free honge aap hume call kariyega sir hamara number aapke liye available hai right?
Customer: Hmm boliye boliye boliye boliye.
Executive: Ji sir actually kya hai aapka jo toll free number hai toll free number se baat karte hai na?
Executive: Nahi toll free number is an customer care number wahan par aap connect karenge to fir aapko call hamari taraf se hi aayega chahe aap paise bhi call karenge wo log aapka call root hoke hamare paas local pe jayega then local team aapko call karega Mr. Krishnan hai jo local Chennai se jo hamari tele team baithi hai Chennai se wo aapko Krishnan call karta hai to but aapka call jo connect hoga wo head office me connect hota hai but isse better hai ki aap mera number save kar lo ya Krishnan ka number save kar lo aap wait karne ki avashyakta nahi hogi same time aapko baat karni hogi Krishnan se ya mere ko direct call kar sakte hai main jo baitha hun head office me baitha hun sir because aapke jo services jo sab kuch jo process hota hai wo sab kuch head office se hota hai aur meri jo local team baithi hai wo south wale Chennai pe sir theek?
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay boliye boliye boliye jaldi jaldi bolna chahiye jo bhi hai jaldi bol do mere abhi ek kaam tha atak gaya hai theek hai boliye.
Executive: Bilkul sir main thoda sa jaldi complete karna chahunga actually kal mere se meri baat hui thi Mr. Krishnan se to unhone kuch aapko whatsapp pe kuch quotations wagera share kari thi aapne bhi kuch quotations wagera mangi thi jaye to kya aapne isko check kiya sir?
Customer: Maine check kiya hai.
Executive: To sir hum isse process kar lete hai sir kyunki dekho usme aapko complimentary me ek services bhi denge aur aapka price bhi kam ho raha hai sir multi years pe choice aapka hai aap ek saal lo do saal lo teen saal lo choice is aapka hai but being a manager dekho pichle 10 saal se main is industry ko dekh raha hun sir jo aapka flex printing machines wagera hai jo aapka product hai sir DTF printers and all to yahi mera prime category jisse main pichle 10 11 saal se main isi products pe kaam kar raha hun to I I would personally suggest dekho aapka business pe aap dekho jo paisa aap laga rahe hai usi ko aap 28000 me aap basic use karne se usko aap multiply karte hai to sir ek services free me mil jayegi matlab ek saal ka 28000 hai do saal ka karenge fir 28 saal 28000 lagega third year karenge then also you have to pay 28000 correct sir ho sakta hai 28000 se services kal market price badhta hai inflation hota hai 28 ka 35 ho sakta hai jaise aap single me dekhenge 35000 ho chuka hai but last year aapne pay kiya wo 28 pay kiya now IndiaMART charging a minimum 35000 rupees for the basic plan correct to main aap se kya kehta hun aap 28000 pe isme humko kar dete hai lekin aapko chahiye aap same services me bhi ja sakte hai ek saal ka do saal ka teen saal ka but there is an advantage if you go for a three years services teen saal ka aap pay karte hai sir I will give you one complimentary services for next three years matlab now you are going to pay for only MDC but I will give you TS combo TS combo matlab TrustSeal combo hota hai jo higher ranking and visibility Kerala me kisi supplier ke paas nahi hai aapke competitors ke paas then man ke chalo aap Kerala me jo aapke product karne wala sun sun sun sun jaldi jaldi jo bhi hai mera jo maine jo jyada dekhte hai ek saal nahi to do saal hmm aapne jo do saal ka aur nahi to ek saal ka do do uske bare me baat batao.
Executive: Theek hai baat hai dheere dheere dheere dheere aage jayega.
Customer: Dheere dheere aage jayegi.
Executive: Sir paisa utna hi hai sir main aapke fayde ki baat kar raha hun paisa aapko utna hi lagega chahe do saal pay karo ya teen saal pay karo man ke chalo dekho do saal ka aapka 65000 aa raha hai 60000 ya 65000 ka but yahi aap teen saal me jayenge to aapka 84 me na sir 70 ke aas pass aapka yahi aa jayega do saal ka but better you go for 84000 plus this you will get one more premium.
Customer: Sir aapko payment aana payment aana chahiye na iske liye payment ka kya dikkat hai?
Executive: Are sir dekho aap ek saal ke baad fir se aap mujhe utna hi payment ya usse jyada hi pay karne wale ho to ek saal aap pay karne ka sir aapka fayda kya hai?
Customer: Abhi ek kaam karo jaldi se jaldi do saal aur ek saal ka kitna kharcha hoga aap aap bol rahe the do saal me karega to ek saal aur free aa jayega hai na?
Executive: Haan haan main wahi keh raha hun aap ispe karenge utna paise me aapko teen teesra saal free me mil raha hai to kyun chodna hai teen saal tak aapko chutti hai na sir koi aapko visibility business me dhyan rakhenge aapko ye payment bhi karne ki jarurat hi nahi hai na isiliye main aapko 84 wala batata hun aur ek services free me bhi de raha hun jo services ka show karta hai uske one more services.
Customer: Bhai utna bharat me mera ko purpose abhi utna payment nahi hai kyunki business bhi kaafi down hai theek hai ek kaam karo ek saal me use karte hai na.
Executive: Sir aap by leads use karte hai by leads milti hai weekly 30 jo aapka abhi kya mil raha hai weekly seven by leads weekly 17 mil raha hai seven by leads par wo sun sun seven by
Customer: By leads me kya hai faltu faltu aadmi se baat karna padta hai kyunki ek saal se do teen saal se ek bande ke paas bande ke sath baat karte hai dobara se wo mission dekhte hai usme kaafi problem aa raha hai aapke jo isme by leads me to wo wo usko wo to chod do matlab abhi gaya mahina me ek aadmi aaya unko ek mission ke liye wo sahi aadmi dobara se aaya dobara se ek by leads by leads me aapko appear ho gaya iski jagah me ek mission ka inquiry hai karne ke baad pata chala ye same aadmi hai teen saal se hum log follow kar rahe hai repeat aa raha hai yahi hai.
Executive: To isme main aapko ye bata raha hun uska problem jo area hai wo solve karne ke liye hi main aapko ye guide kar raha hun isme to aapke paas options hai to aap isko plan karenge to aap khud to best kar sakte hai.
Customer: Hmm jo aapka business wagera aa raha hai usme quality of leads badh jayega aur quantity bhi badh jayegi aapko sir kyunki sir online business me hamesha ranking matter karta hai aap itne paise dene ke bawajud bhi aapko ranking na mile to sir kya hi fayda us 84000 ka to main to aapka complimentary ki baat kar raha hun fayda to aapka hai sir marzi bhi aapka hai aap jo paise denge wo services dene wala hun but ek ek experience ke naate bata raha hun dekho pichle 10 saal se main market dekh raha hun paisa laga rahe to aapka position bhi top me aana chahiye na sir abhi aap 84 bhi denge to aap basic me rahenge to kya mazak hai sir aap 70000 pe do saal ka pay kar doge 70000 pe pay karne ke baad bhi aap basic me rahenge sirf paisa bacha rahe hai aur aapka ranking aapka niche hai business us level ka nahi milega ispe aap premium pay kiye 85 nahi hai bhai utna business abhi Kerala me nahi hai mujhe pata hai iske liye.
Executive: Are sir aap business nahi badhayenge to kaise aayega sir main pehle customer ko to aane do fir production wagera sab aapka banta rahega production bhi aayega material bhi aayega sab aata hai pehle customer aap se mangega tabhi to sir aapka bhi man banega ki aage aur kaam badhana hai jab aapke paas customer nahi hai to aap dono ka propose milne me ek baar dekh ke main aapko bata dunga theek hai aapko kya chahiye batao pehle ek saal ka chahiye do saal ka chahiye ek saal ek saal aur do saal ek aur do saal dono ka haan fir main aapko complimentary wala services bhi milega three year pe jayenge to main ek services product free dunga otherwise I will give you two services jo one year and three year dono hai mere paas main aapko wahi dono share kar deta hun baad me pehle bola tha ye do saal ka le loge to ek saal free ho jayega karke hai na?
Customer: Are baba do saal ka wahi price to fir aapko 84 padega sir third year services pe bhi paisa lagta hai fir isko do saal me karunga na do saal ka main 84 ka kam karke 70000 me do saal dunga third year ka aapka 84 karenge theek hai aapko proposal de de proposal de de proposal dene ke baad ek baar dekhne ke baad main aapko turant bata dunga theek hai kab karna hai payment batao abhi kar lo abhi kar lo main thoda time me free ho jayega chalo main aapko main aapko ek proposal bhej ke sir main aapko call karta hun thodi der me ya fir aap free ho ke mujhe call kar lena main free karunga nahi to aapka number personal number mujhe whatsapp karna theek hai yahi personal number hai isme main available rahunga aap same number you can share nahi nahi nahi ye aapka jo iska hi number hai IndiaMART ka hi number hai haan haan same number hai sir mera same number hai chalo theek hai aap de de haan haan haan haan haan okay sir no problem okay okay okay okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a call at a specific time.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.

- Thinks South Indian executives have different approach.



Resolution:

- Executive explained call scheduling and appointment system.

- Executive explained the benefits of a 3-year subscription.

- Executive offered to send a proposal for review.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a proposal.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, pricing, services
